segments.text: Hello , Dora , I haven't seen you for a long time . Where have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn â€™ t go anywhere . I stayed at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing . I just feel very lonely in this city . I miss my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I know . Sometimes I have the same feeling with you . But you'd better not be so emotional .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you stay and accompany me for a while ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , no problem . You can call me any time you are alone from now on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much . You are so sweet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . We are friends .
segments.speaker: S1
